headline.print_headline: Jones Injures Hamstring at Scouting Combine
headline.main: Cardale Jones Injures Hamstring at Scouting Combine

snippet: Quarterback Cardale Jones’s draft stock may have taken another hit when he pulled up lame on his second 40-yard dash attempt at the N.F.L.’s annual scouting combine.
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Cardale Jones’s draft stock may have taken another hit when he pulled up lame on his second 40-yard dash attempt at the N.F.L.’s annual scouting combine.
